news.title: 美伊谈判破裂？战争一触即发
特朗普下令联邦机构停用Anthropic的AI技术
news.title0: Trump orders government to stop using Anthropic in battle over AI use
news.content: 美国总统特朗普下令所有联邦机构立即停止使用AI公司Anthropic的技术，并要求在六个月内完成过渡。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump said Friday he would direct every federal agency to immediately stop using technology from AI developer Anthropic.
news.author: BBC

news.title: NASA调整重返月球计划，增加新任务
news.title0: Nasa announces change to its Moon landing plans
news.content: 美国宇航局宣布调整“阿尔忒弥斯”计划，将在首次载人登月前增加一次近地轨道任务，以测试对接技术。
news.content0: Nasa is adding an extra mission to its Artemis programme before it attempts to land astronauts on the Moon for the first time in half a century.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 巴基斯坦与阿富汗爆发激烈跨境冲突
news.title0: Pakistan Strikes Afghanistan in ‘Open War’ Against Taliban Government
news.content: 巴基斯坦对阿富汗首都喀布尔及多个省份发动空袭，阿富汗塔利班政府称已开始报复，双方冲突急剧升级。
news.content0: Pakistan and Afghanistan engaged in their fiercest clashes in years on Friday, according to officials from both nations, escalating months of tension and border skirmishes into an open conflict. Afghan troops stormed dozens of Pakistani border positions and Pakistan responded with a wave of airstrikes targeting major cities and military hubs.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 美驻以使馆建议工作人员尽快离境
news.title0: U.S. Says Staff Can Leave Israel, Urging Speed, as Possible Iran Strike Looms
news.content: 因美伊紧张局势升级，美国驻耶路撒冷大使馆建议非紧急工作人员及家属尽快离开以色列。
news.content0: With the threat of a U.S. strike on Iran looming, the United States Embassy in Jerusalem has told its workers that they may leave Israel and warned them that if they want to, it is vital that they do so immediately.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 特朗普一通电话加剧沙特与阿联酋紧张关系
news.title0: How a Call From Trump Ignited a Bitter Feud Between Two U.S. Allies
news.content: 特朗普向阿联酋总统透露，沙特王储曾要求美国对阿联酋实施制裁，加剧了这两个美国盟友间的紧张关系。
news.content0: Behind the scenes, tensions had simmered for years between Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates, two powerful U.S. allies. It took a call from President Trump to bring those tensions crashing into the open.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 全球山火季重叠加剧，影响消防资源调配
news.title0: Wildfire Seasons Are Starting to Overlap. That Spells Trouble for Firefighting.
news.content: 研究显示，气候变化导致全球各地极端山火天气天数增加，山火季重叠，影响各国间消防资源共享。
news.content0: Converging wildfire seasons around the world are increasing the risk that firefighting agencies will be less able to share resources like ground crews and water bombers, according to a new study.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 韩国批准谷歌地图出口数据，服务将全面恢复
news.title0: South Korea Clears Way for Google Maps to Fully Operate
news.content: 韩国批准谷歌出口详细地图数据，谷歌地图在韩国的实时导航等完整功能有望全面上线。
news.content0: South Korea said on Friday that it had approved Google’s request to export detailed geographic data out of the country, reversing a longstanding policy that had made Google Maps largely nonfunctional in the country.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 古驰时装秀前发布AI生成图引争议
news.title0: Gucci asks: Can AI ever be luxury?
news.content: 古驰在时装秀前发布一系列AI生成的奢华场景图片，引发社交媒体用户对AI与奢侈品结合的讨论。
news.content0: Backstage at the runway debut of the newnewGucci – the third rebrand that the luxury titan has undergone since Alessandro Michele left in 2022 – designer Demna was feeling the amore. “I hope I made you feel Gucci today,” he said. “The energy, the passion, the fun, the sexy…. I feel like I’m falling in love with this feeling I cannot really understand.”
news.author: CNN

news.title: 水下摄影师大奖赛展示年度惊人影像
news.title0: Incredible images showcased in Underwater Photographer of the Year 2026 awards
news.content: 2026年度水下摄影师大奖赛结果揭晓，澳大利亚摄影师拍摄的象海豹幼崽照片获得总冠军。
news.content0: Australian photographer Matty Smith has been namedUnderwater Photographer of the Year(UPY) 2026 for his image of a pair of southern elephant seal pups in a rockpool on the Falkland Islands.
news.author: CNN
